item.title: Top News Sudeep Pharma Schedules Q2FY26 Earnings Call for December 22, 2025 1 hour ago Sudeep Pharma Limited has announced an earnings conference call to discuss Q2FY26 operational and financial performance, scheduled for December 22, 2025, at 11:30 AM IST. The call will review the company's performance for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. Senior management, including Director Shanil Bhayani and CFO Ketan Vyas, will present results and address investor queries. ICICI Securities is coordinating the call using the Diamond Pass registration system.
item.description: Top News Sudeep Pharma Schedules Q2FY26 Earnings Call for December 22, 2025 1 hour ago Sudeep Pharma Limited has announced an earnings conference call to discuss Q2FY26 operational and financial performance, scheduled for December 22, 2025, at 11:30 AM IST. The call will review the company's performance for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. Senior management, including Director Shanil Bhayani and CFO Ketan Vyas, will present results and address investor queries. ICICI Securities is coordinating the call using the Diamond Pass registration system.

item.title: EIH Limited Announces The Oberoi Luxury Resort at Historic Makaibari Tea Estate in Darjeeling 15 minutes ago EIH Hotels, part of The Oberoi Group, has signed a management agreement for a luxury resort at the Makaibari Tea Estate in Darjeeling. The Oberoi, Makaibari Tea Estate, Darjeeling will feature 25 keys and is set to open in 2030. The resort, designed by Nava Design Studios Co. Ltd., Bangkok, and developed with Luxmi Tea Co Private Limited, will be located 35 km from Bagdogra International Airport. This project is part of EIH Hotels' expansion plan, which includes 29 upcoming hotels and luxury cruisers, adding approximately 2,251 keys by 2030.
item.description: EIH Limited Announces The Oberoi Luxury Resort at Historic Makaibari Tea Estate in Darjeeling 15 minutes ago EIH Hotels, part of The Oberoi Group, has signed a management agreement for a luxury resort at the Makaibari Tea Estate in Darjeeling. The Oberoi, Makaibari Tea Estate, Darjeeling will feature 25 keys and is set to open in 2030. The resort, designed by Nava Design Studios Co. Ltd., Bangkok, and developed with Luxmi Tea Co Private Limited, will be located 35 km from Bagdogra International Airport. This project is part of EIH Hotels' expansion plan, which includes 29 upcoming hotels and luxury cruisers, adding approximately 2,251 keys by 2030.

item.title: Markets at Noon: Nifty and Sensex Show Slight Dip in Mid-Day Trading on December 15 2 hours ago Indian markets show a slight downward trend at midday, with Nifty 50 at 26,016.45 (-0.12%) and Sensex at 85,202.32 (-0.08%). InterGlobe Aviation faces potential regulatory action, while SEPC Limited announces a major coal mining project MOU. Market sentiment remains cautiously negative, with investors closely monitoring these developments.

item.title: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 4 hours ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
item.description: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 4 hours ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
